## AbstractComponentTypeRefResolver interface

Service that resolves a component type ref given a layout.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface AbstractComponentTypeRefResolver<T> 
```

|  Property | Type | Description |

|  [getTypeByLayout](./component-api.abstractcomponenttyperefresolver.gettypebylayout.md) | <code>(aLayout: Layout, aLayoutMode?: string) =&gt; Observable&lt;T&gt;</code> | Returns the type object based on the layout configuration |
